title: swaramayaa sugNaalayaa
sahitya:
svaramayA suguNAlaya sundarAya namOstutE


anupallavi

 parama puruSa pancAnana pashupAsha vimOcanA karadhrta Damaruga janitOmakara nAda vilasita sapta


caraNam
 dhana dhAnya sampatprada sarasvatI priyanuta manasija madaharA mAdhavA priyakarA
 kanaka shaila nivAsA kALakNTha sarvEsha sanaka sanandana vandita sadaya harikEshA
